mapper.select: SELECT WJAX_ORDER.ID, WJAX_ORDER.CUSTOMER, pi.PROC_INST_ID_ , act2.ACT_ID_ , act2.ACT_NAME_ FROM WJAX_ORDER, ACT_HI_PROCINST pi, (SELECT PROC_INST_ID_, max(act1.ID_) MAX_ID from ACT_HI_ACTINST act1 group by PROC_INST_ID_ ) as act1, ACT_HI_ACTINST act2 WHERE pi.BUSINESS_KEY_ = WJAX_ORDER.ID and act1.PROC_INST_ID_ = pi.PROC_INST_ID_ and act2.ID_ = MAX_ID
